name: Drone Destroyer (Keegan Lenz)
description:
Survive for as long as you can against the onslaught of drones.

Controls:

 - WASD for movement

 - Mouse for aim and shoot

 - E to purchase weapons, perks, and upgrades

 - Escape to quit

Weapons:

 - The pistol does 50 damage per bullet (10000 after first Pack-a-Punch)

 - The rifle does 75 damage per bullet (150 after first Pack-a-Punch)

 - The sniper does 2250 damage per bullet (5000 after first Pack-a-Punch)

Purchases:

 - Top right perk gives you one extra life

- Middle right perk doubles your weapon's fire rate

- Bottom left perk doubles your reload speed

- Middle left perk increases your health from 100 to 250

- Pack-a-Punch increases magazine size and weapon damage by a substantial amount
